scripts.build: tsc -p ./apps/$npm_config_app_id && vite build apps/$npm_config_app_id && mv apps/$npm_config_app_id/dist ./dist/client
scripts.build-all: npm run build-node --app_id=$npm_config_app_id && npm run build --app_id=$npm_config_app_id
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm run build-all --app_name=$APP_NAME && npm run run-server --app_name=$APP_NAME
